alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Logan County through 645 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Russell Springs, or 21 miles northwest of Scott State Lake, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Logan County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds associated with this storm may result in areas of reduced visibility associated with blowing dust. Use extreme caution if you must travel and be alert for rapidly changing visibility.
